text: Peefchay reh janey walay log rasool Allah (PBUH) kay janey kay baad apney bethay rehney per khush hain enhon ney Allah ki raah mein apney maal aur apni janon say jihad kerna na pasand rakha aur enhon ney keh diya kay iss garmi mein mat niklo. Keh dijiye kay dozakh ki aag boht hi sakht garam hai kaash kay woh samajhtay hotay
